title: tour: rand.Intn(10) always returns 1
body:
Context: http://127.0.0.1:3999/basics/1

```fmt.Println("My favorite number is", rand.Intn(10))```

When I run basics/1 on the tour, the random number returned is always 1. This persists between different runs of  ```$ go tool tour```

```
$ go version
go version go1.5.3 darwin/amd64
```
